meanings.definition: The act of dividing land into plots for development.
meanings.sent1: The platting of the field into smaller sections allowed for new houses to be built.
meanings.sent2: The city council approved the platting of the land for a new shopping center.
meanings.sent3: The platting of the backyard caused a funny mix-up with the property lines.
meanings.sent4: Her idea for platting the garden with different flower beds was truly innovative.
meanings.sent5: The platting of the map made it easier to visualize the future neighborhood layout.

meanings.definition: The process of braiding or weaving hair.
meanings.sent1: She learned the art of platting hair from her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The stylist was skilled in platting intricate designs into the bride's hair.
meanings.sent3: Platting her hair in a unique pattern made her stand out at the party.
meanings.sent4: The platting of colorful ribbons into her hair created a festive look.
meanings.sent5: Her talent for platting hair was evident in the beautiful updo she created.

meanings.definition: The act of forming metal into a thin sheet.
meanings.sent1: The platting of the silver was done meticulously to create a shiny surface.
meanings.sent2: The artisan specialized in platting copper into delicate patterns.
meanings.sent3: Platting the metal into a thin sheet required precision and skill.
meanings.sent4: The platting of the gold transformed it into a stunning piece of jewelry.
meanings.sent5: The intricate platting of the metal gave it a unique texture and shine.
